MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Recap of Episode 1.
We'll be working with friends to solve a crime on Kuala Lum's tea plantation.

It's after everyone has introduced themselves and prepared for the mission. Jeran, one of the reliable helpers, shows a surprisingly useful skill. Raised by wild tigers in the jungle, she is an expert hunter and is able to track down the culprit who had stolen the tea leaves by following footprints and scents.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Jeran
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Grrrr! It's weird to call them a criminal, maybe it was a beast or a monster that stole the tea leaves! But tigers are strong, they're the strongest, and no matter what they're up against, they'll never lose~!
Shouting cheerfully, we all explore the cave hidden in the gaps between the hills, led by Jeran.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Jeran
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Mmm-hmm-hmm♪
It's just ahead...the smell is getting thicker and thicker!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh my~♪ You're amazing, Jeran... Tea has deodorizing properties, so it should be difficult to trace the smell~

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Jeran
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Grrr? I'm amazing?
I want you to praise me more~♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes, what a good girl♪ Jeran, you are so clever...Your fur is so fluffy... Can I give you a hug?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Jeran
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes! Tigers are not pets, so you can't really pet them, but you feed me well, so I love you, Kuala Lum! I'm going to allow you to hug me~♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Awilda
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hahaha☆ Good friends are a beautiful thing! Hmmm...Maybe because the surrounding air is deodorized by the tea plantations, it's easier to smell the strong and foreign smells that have become subtle?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Phnom Penh
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yeah, it's like they don't even want to cover their tracks, you know? They left footprints all over the place. No, maybe they want to expose the crime? Maybe they're suicidal. Maybe they'll drown with me♪
They all proceed with the survey steadily, conversing in a friendly manner. It's surprising―the people gathered here are usually troublemakers who get scolded all the time for doing various things.
That's precisely why...If you don't do a lot of missions and get results and if you're not good, you'll be fired from the SSS― I called them up this time to make them earn achievements.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh my~? It's true that Jeran and Phnom Penh are often naughty, but Awilda is a serious and hardworking girl. I guess they think she's a problem child~, poor thing~

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Awilda
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hmm. Maybe I'm being watched because I forcefully recruited members before the swim team was officially recognized, and I fought with the upper management to create school rules related to 'club activities'. People who go against the system tend to be labeled as "delinquents".

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Oh my~? That's a disaster~
Awilda is just doing her best to do what she wants though~?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Awilda
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yeah! But I don't regret it! There are people who understand me, like you, Kuala Lum, and it's youthful to not look back! It's also youthful to brawl with adults who don't understand you...!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Phnom Penh
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Yeah, yeah, right? We're all drowning in water.
That's what it's like to be a youth♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Oh my, Phnom Penh, you're always like that, aren't you?
Awilda and Jeran, too. It's great to be passionate about something♪

While listening to their conversation without asking, I understand. Kuala Lum never denies the other three, who are often marginalized for their outlandish words and actions. She accepts them, affirms them and even praises them.

I think I understand why she is adored as the leader of the free-spirited Flamarine people,
and people are even said to consult with Kuala Lum regarding Flamarine matters.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh, my...? Everyone stop~♪
Of course, Kuala Lum is also an excellent soldier. She seems to be out of it because she is so calm and relaxed, but surprisingly, she can do everything quickly and efficiently.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
There seems to be an open space in the back here~
...Jeran, can you feel the presence of a monster~?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Jeran
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Hmm~? There's no monster, or if there is, it's a weak one~!
That's what it smells like~ Grrrr!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh my~♪ Still, we should be careful~ We can only fight in close quarters, and the last thing we need is to be shot at unilaterally from a distance― Don't let your guard down~

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Phnom Penh
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It's okay. If arrows or bullets come flying at us, use me as a shield, okay?
Actually, pain kind of feels good to me♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Awilda
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I understand your special hobby, Phnom Penh, but I always think... it's painful and distressing to watch, you know? You might die, so if you can, do it in moderation, okay?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Haha...Everyone has their own hobbies...Oh~?

We proceed as if we are having a tea party.
In the middle of the open space, there is a large circular stone tablet.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's not a tablet, but a stone table~ You see, it's a big circle with little stones like chairs placed around it. Haha, perfect for a tea party~♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I thought we might get hungry or thirsty on the way, so I brought lunch~
This is perfect. We'll take a break here and have a tea party―

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Jeran
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Grrrr!? Wait!
Kuala Lum, there's something in the shadows there~!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Awilda
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
An enemy!? Phnom Penh, I need you to protect Kuala Lum!
Me and Jeran will go in there. The important thing is teamwork...!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh my~ you guys are so overprotective...Oh?
A troubled, scowling Kuala Lum controls everyone who is about to start fighting. Then she gracefully bends at the waist and peers quite carelessly into the shadows where something seems to be.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Can everyone please put their weapons away?
I think I've figured out what's really going on here.
Continue to Episode 3.
